name: x2y-web2droid-x2y-api
description: Converts any website URL to installable Android APK. A system that takes ANY website URL and spits out an installable Android APK by wrapping the website inside a customized WebView container—like a PWA on steroids—then packages it as a real Android app with permissions, icons, offline capabilities, and background services. Made by x2y dev tools
author: x2y dev tools
